titleStmt.title: T.H. Lacy's Acting Edition of Victorian Plays (1848-1873) : a bibliography
titleStmt.author: Revised and extended by Lou Burnard

sourceDesc.p: This is an enhanced and extended version of the catalogue of Lacy's Acting Edition originally created by the Victorian Plays Project (VPP) at the University of Galway. That project's website has been inaccessible for some time, though some of the modernized PDFs it produced are still available from YUMPU. The present catalogue has been made by screen-scraping and re-encoding data originally created by the VPP, which has been cross-checked against other contemporary sources. Many minor errors and inconsistencies have been corrected, and much additional information added, particularly about available digitizations of the plays.

Lacy's Acting Edition was published both in the form of individual play scripts, and as a set of 100 bound volumes, each containing 15 plays. The catalogue is organized in the same way as the original volumes. For more about Lacy and the Acting Edition, see

Authors' names have been standardised, in the form "Surname, Forenames-or-initials" following the most frequent usage in cases of doubt. Square brackets are used to indicate that the author name contained within them is not attested on the titlepage of the work in question; the attribute resp is used to indicate the grounds for making the attribution, and takes one of the following values:
btao: ("By The Author Of") the title is listed in a btao indication somewhere
ATC: attribution is made in the Adelphi Theatre Catalog
msnote: attribution is made by manuscript annotation on a library copy
nicoll: attribution made in Allardyce Nicoll's Handlist
